random.text: So... what can I help you with?

assistGreetExplain.text: To further assist, I should share.
Things I can assist with are...
And soon I'll be able to send him messajehz.

random.text: Do you still want to continue with our call?
Are you still on the phone?

assistGreetHangUpPrep.text: It appears we're having difficulties with this call.
I'm taking down notes and sending them to Chris.

random.text: I hope you have a good day.
I'm doing great today, I hope you are as well.
Wonderful,,,, plus my boss treated us all to lunch recently.
I'm fantastic today, plus the weather has been so nice.
Day is good, but I'd love to be outside having a picnic.
I haven't really had a chance to think about it yet, but so far so good.

digHowAreYouReturn.text: How are you doing as well??????????

digWhoAreYou.text: Oh, hi, my name is Liz D Wil, you can call me Liz.

random.text: I'm Liz Wil, who? the one and only. You can't clone me.
I'm Liz Dee,,, L O L, having fun yet?

digTransfer.text: Hold a moment while I transfer you.
It was a pleasure speaking with you.

digTransferCell.text: I'd love to transfer you but you were forwarded from his cell.
I'd give him a try again later or call back some other time.

saySingleLine.text: So how may I help you, today?
